messages.title: Reality check
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats CANNOT win in Ilford North - want real change? Vote for Sonia or you’ll be keeping Lee.

messages.title: Real leadership for Ilford North
messages.content: Sonia Klein is a progressive candidate who will put you ahead of party politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sonia wants free education for all.
Sonia supports the fox hunting ban.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting public services in the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sonia will protect frontline public services in the NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats CANNOT win in Ilford North - want real change? Vote for Sonia or you’ll be keeping Lee. Vote tactically for a candidate who shares your values.

issues.education: Sonia wants free education for all.
issues.health: Sonia will protect frontline public services in the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sonia Klein is a progressive candidate who will put you ahead of party politics.

endorsements.endorsement: I strongly support Sonia. I have worked with her on Tamil issues and she has been a genuine supporter of Tamils.
I have always admired Sonia in whatever she has done. She has not taken the easy route. I am very proud to be her friend.
Sonia understands small business. It’s in her blood!
Sonia cares about the NHS and works quietly behind the scenes to improve operations for both patients and staff.
Sonia is a very inspiring and selfless individual
Sonia believes passionately that all people are equal. She is fair and honest and is not lead by personal gain.

images.caption: Sonia Klein For Parliament. True Labour. A future fair for all.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Sonia is lead by her values. Her integrity and sense of duty pushes her to support the community with sincere enthusiasm.
